fields.Transcription: Hi, my name is Sukanya Bhan. I live in India, my birth place is Jammu and Kashmir and work in New Delhi as a multi media journalist. My sign language is a little different from authentic Indian sign langauge, mine is self home made sign langauge as I am a child of deaf adults (CODA). I used to observe my parents and that's how I picked the language this sign language. It hurts to see how ignored and marginalised is the disabled sector in our country as compared to other nations. The government should do something for them and I hope the future holds a society that is inclusive. Thank you.
